Confirm Present Absent Total Clear Update Update Subject Enter subject name Select Month & Year Enter new name No attendance yet. Add some to view progress Click on the + button to add a subject" OK Settings Look & Feel Dynamic color, Dark theme, Language Dark theme System On Off Additional settings Auto update Check for updates automatically About Contributors and support High contrast dark mode Pitch black dark theme for devices with OLED display Dynamic colors Automatically set the app theme according to the device wallpaper Haptics & Vibration Interactive haptics for touch feedback Default language Change the default language of the app Lead developer Just a guy who loves apps and design Like what I do?
Consider buying me a coffee App Version Changelogs History of all the changes made to the app No changelog found for this version Feature request If you have any ideas or suggestions for the app, let us know Report issue Report any issue or bug you have encountered while using the app License Learn about the license this app is using Github Visit the github repository of the app Select Customisation Customise certain UI elements to your liking Subject card style Subject name Adjust card corner radius Enable auto update Update channel Check for updates Update available ! Latest version Current version Download Stable What's new! No update available Network error Request timeout Click on the download button to get the latest version of Driftly from the github repository Pre-release Pre-release builds may be unstable Behavior Remember calendar month and year Turn on this option to remember the last viewed month for every subject Show attendance streaks If enabled, attendance streaks will be shown on the calendar Modify certain behavior of the app Reset to current month Previous month Next month Back button These versions are still in testing and may contain unfinished features or unexpected bugs. If you choose to update to a pre-release, please be aware that things might break or behave strangely.
If you encounter any issues, crashes, or weird behavior, please report them so we can fix and improve Driftly before the stable release.
Thanks for helping us build better! Initial release
Added calendar to mark attendance status
Added per subject progress display
Added ability to add, remove and edit subjects
Added settings for customising user experience Fixed some color values in color palette selection
Fixed some UI margins
Added prerelease build update checker Improved color scheme in high contrast dark theme
Added what's new bottomsheet to show changelogs after an update
Code optimisations
